# HR System Design Project

This workspace contains comprehensive requirements documentation for a modern HR management system.

## Project Structure

- `requirements/` - Contains all requirement documents organized by user role
- `README.md` - Project overview and getting started guide

## Requirements Categories

- **Employee Requirements** - Features for end users/employees
- **HR Staff Requirements** - Features for HR personnel
- **Manager Requirements** - Features for team managers and supervisors
- **Admin Requirements** - System administration features
- **System Requirements** - Technical and infrastructure requirements
